scripts.install-dev: python3 -m venv venv 2>/dev/null || true && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && echo '✅ Установка завершена! Активируйте venv: source venv/bin/activate'
scripts.install-dev:user: pip3 install --break-system-packages -r requirements-dev.txt 2>/dev/null || pip3 install --user -r requirements-dev.txt || echo '⚠️  Используйте виртуальное окружение: yarn install-dev'
scripts.lint: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m flake8 app/ --config=.flake8; else python3 -m flake8 app/ --config=.flake8 || echo '⚠️  flake8 не установлен. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.pylint: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m pylint app/ --rcfile=.pylintrc --exit-zero; else python3 -m pylint app/ --rcfile=.pylintrc --exit-zero || echo '⚠️  pylint не установлен. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.type-check: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m mypy app/ --config-file=.mypy.ini --no-error-summary || true; else python3 -m mypy app/ --config-file=.mypy.ini --no-error-summary || echo '⚠️  mypy не установлен. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.format: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m black app/ --config=pyproject.toml && ./venv/bin/python -m isort app/ --settings-file=pyproject.toml; else python3 -m black app/ --config=pyproject.toml && python3 -m isort app/ --settings-file=pyproject.toml || echo '⚠️  black/isort не установлены. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.format:check: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m black app/ --check --config=pyproject.toml && ./venv/bin/python -m isort app/ --check-only --settings-file=pyproject.toml; else python3 -m black app/ --check --config=pyproject.toml && python3 -m isort app/ --check-only --settings-file=pyproject.toml || echo '⚠️  black/isort не установлены. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run pylint && yarn run type-check && yarn run format:check
scripts.quick-check: if [ -f ./venv/bin/python ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m flake8 app/ --config=.flake8 --count --statistics; else python3 -m flake8 app/ --config=.flake8 --count --statistics || echo '⚠️  flake8 не установлен. Запустите: yarn install-dev'; fi
scripts.verify: yarn run lint && yarn run pylint && yarn run type-check && yarn run format:check
